mapper.select: select role from t_sys_user where user_id = #{userId}

select e.user_name userName, e.image_path imagePath, e.role, a.store_id storeId, a.invite_code inviteCode, a.store_name storeName, b.value province, c.value city, d.value area, a.store_address address, e.version from t_sys_store a, t_sys_region b, t_sys_region c, t_sys_region d, t_sys_user e where a.manager_id = e.user_id and a.province = b.id and a.city = c.id and a.area = d.id and user_id = #{userId} and a.is_deleted = 0
select user_name userName, image_path userImage, role, phone, version from t_sys_user where user_id = #{userId}

select a.user_name userName, a.image_path userImage, a.role, a.version, c.store_id storeId, c.store_name storeName, b.invite_code inviteCode, c.store_address address from t_sys_user a, t_sys_customer b LEFT JOIN t_sys_store c on (b.invite_code = c.invite_code) where user_id = #{userId} and a.user_id = b.cus_id
select user_pwd from t_sys_user where user_id = #{userId}
mapper.update: update t_sys_user set user_pwd = #{userNewPwd}, gmt_modified = now(), last_modified_by = #{userId}, version = version +1 where user_id = #{userId} and version = #{version}
